item.content:encoded:
I’ll be presenting at the Social Media Club of Salt Lake City (SMCSLC) on WordPress this Thursday September 17th. Also presenting will be Thom Allen (beginner session) and Jake Spurlock (intermediate session/BuddyPress).

Details:

Date: September 17, 2009
Time: 6 to 8 p.m.
Place: University of Utah | Fine Arts Auditorium with breakout sessions at the neighboring BEHS Building, Rooms 106-108 | map it (parking instructions included in map link) | Special thanks to Andy Thompson in the University of Utahâ€™s Marketing and Communications department for arranging for our meeting space.

RSVP: on Eventbrite
Twitter hashtag: #smcslc

Sept. 17 meeting: All About WordPress

Come by and say hi. And if you have something specific you’d like me to cover in my break out session (advanced WP) drop me a note.
